description:
Highly customizable replacement of the Alt-Tab window/app switchers that offers 'type to search' mode, various filtering and sorting options, workspace and monitor navigation, VIM navigation hotkeys, window control and an app launcher.
AATWS is compatible with Custom Hot Corners - Extended extension, allows to configure any mouse button and scroll wheel and can be used instead of a dock.

Follow the link below for more information and bug reports.

Keywords: alttab, search, find, windows, popup delay, applications, apps, dock, monitor, thumbnail, preview, move windows, launch app, switch windows
name: AATWS - Advanced Alt-Tab Window Switcher
